dataset_id: Global Monthly Climatology for the Twentieth Century (New et al.)
title: Global Monthly Climatology for the Twentieth Century (New et al.)
summary: A 0.5 degree lat/lon data set of monthly surface climate over global land areas, excluding Antarctica. Primary variables are interpolated directly from station time-series: precipitation, mean temperature and diurnal temperature range.
